name: Say Cheese! It's a Cheesy Chase
name_original: Say Cheese! It's a Cheesy Chase
description:
This game was a class project.

It was obviously inspired on the Cooper's Hill Cheese Race in Gloucester, England.

We had complete freedom on how to make it and which assets to use (with public domain license, for any kind of use, preferably), but with a challenge in mind.

(The majority of the assets are from Kenney.nl.)

The challenge we chose was Reversing Stereotypes. On this game, our objective was to "reverse" the idea of a racing game, where the player is being checked for the number of bones it has on the end of the race and not the time it took to tumble the mountain.
